timeline.message:
Updated materials editor

 - added a switch binded to `auto_update` for scm fields - defaulted the value to true
 - added a switch binded to `ignore_for_scheduling` for dependency material - default value false

Updated materials editor

 - added a switch binded to `auto_update` for scm fields - defaulted the value to true
 - added a switch binded to `ignore_for_scheduling` for dependency material - default value false

timeline.bodyText: I like this -- tests are more resilient and it communicates intent. 👍
timeline.author: marques-work
